title: Asking to move to a different table

turns.user_response_option_ko: 완벽하네요. 새 테이블이 준비되면 안내해 주세요.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Sure, I'm happy to accommodate. Let me find a table with softer lighting for you.
turns.user_response_option_en: Great, I'm looking forward to a more cozy ambiance. Thank you!
